column1: '''Elrond's Holy Round Table: Essays on Tolkien, Sayers and the Arthur Saga''' is the [[1990]] issue of ''[[Lembas (journal)
column2: Lembas-extra]]'', published by [[Unquendor]]. It was edited by [[René van Rossenberg]].
